metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29495 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Nim is a statically typed compiled systems programming language. In Nimstandard library before 1.4.2, httpClient SSL/TLS certificate verificationwas disabled by default. Users can upgrade to version 1.4.2 to receive apatch or, as a workaround, set "verifyMode = CVerifyPeer" as documented.

criterions.comment: nim package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
